text: Olivia Anna Cristina Llewellyn (born 1980) is an English actress, best known for her television appearances portraying Isabel Danforth in The Lizzie Borden Chronicles and Mina Harker in Penny Dreadful. ==Career== Trained at the London Academy of Music and Dramatic Art, Llewellyn appeared in supporting roles in several television series and films before portraying Mina Harker in the Showtime series Penny Dreadful in 2014 and 2015, and Isabel Danforth in the Lifetime series The Lizzie Borden Chronicles in 2015. Llewellyn has appeared onstage as Flaminia in Timon of Athens with the Royal National Theatre, as Luciana in The Comedy of Errors with the Royal Shakespeare Company and as Cecile De Volanges Les Liaisons dangereuses at the Playhouse Theatre in the West End. {|class="wikitable" |- ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Year ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Project ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Role ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Notes ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | |- | 2005 | Beethoven | Josephine Deym | TV miniseries | align=center | |- | 2008 | Midsomer Murders | Helen | TV series/Episode: "Blood Wedding" | align=center | |- | 2009 | The Boat That Rocked (aka Pirate Radio) | Margaret | Film | align=center | |- | 2009 | Kingdom | Moonbeam | TV series/Episode 3.6 | align=center | |- | 2011 | Dimensions | Annie | Film | align=center | |- | 2011 | Enchantress (aka The Death of Merlin) | Viviane | Film | align=center | |- | 2013 | Doctors | Renata Wicker | TV soap opera/Episode: "Mother's Choice" | align=center | |- | 2013 | Lucan | Kiki | TV movie | align=center | |- | 2014, 2015 | Penny Dreadful | Mina Harker | TV series/10 episodes | align=center | |- | 2015 | The Musketeers | Lucie De Foix | TV series/Episode: "Keep Your Friends Close" | align=center | |- | 2015 | Call the Midwife | Colette Wimbish | TV series/Episode 4.1 | align=center | |- | 2015 | The Lizzie Borden Chronicles | Isabel Danforth | TV series/5 episodes | align=center | |- | 2016 | Casualty | Verity Barratt | TV series/Episode: "Survivors" | align=center | |} ==Personal life== Born in 1980, Llewellyn is the daughter of Sir David St Vincent "Dai" Llewellyn, 4th Baronet and Vanessa Hubbard. She has a younger sister, Arabella (born 1983). Llewellyn also has several half- and step-siblings, including actresses Gabriella Wilde and Isabella Calthorpe. ==References== ==External links== * * Olivia Llewellyn at waringandmckenna.com Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:English film actresses Category:English soap opera actresses Category:English stage actresses Category:English television actresses Category:21st-century English actresses Category:Alumni of the London Academy of Music and Dramatic Art Category:English people of Swedish descent Category:English people of Welsh descent
title: Olivia Llewellyn
